thread.title: How to Get Around at the 2018 Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang

author: Eun-Young Jeong
title: How to Get Around at the 2018 Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang
text:
The 2018 Pyeongchang Winter Olympics in South Korea starts on Feb. 9 and runs through Feb. 25. Here are a few more tips from WSJ’s local reporter to help you get around.
1. Navigation tip: Google Maps may not cut it.
Because of South Korea’s restrictions on exporting map data abroad, Google Maps can only provide limited services here, which... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
